name: YASS STATION dating sim
description:
it's 4 in the morning and you're working your usual shift at the YASS station convenience store. everything goes swimmingly until an oddly familiar college burnout,  a bodybuilder who you could easily mistake for the sun,  a weird bloodied neko girl furrycon attendee, and some guy who claims he has a bestselling novel that you could not care less about but he's hot so maybe you care now a bit walk in at the same time.

4 good endings, 4 bad endings. ONE SECRET ENDING that is not really a secret bc it's like right there.

which yass station adventure will you choose to embark in?

***

yall this is like a very goofy game (no, like literally) i essentially made as a yasscore aesthetic crash course thingy for a couple of my friends (who are the only ones i expect to play this really, but if you managed to find this...) WHY HELLO, i hope this game finds you well :-D i hope you enjoy it even though it's generally just me trying to beep boop quirky programmer my way around renpy for the past two weeks also some choices will loop u back cause i got tired of writing dialogue and this game is incredibly easy to win as long as u have like basic knowledge of what does or doesnt offend someone but like offending them is kinda fun too lmao. have fun!
